name: mermaid_mcp_agent
description: AI assistant specialized in creating professional diagrams and flowcharts for business processes, org charts, timelines, and workflows
useCases: Create simple flowcharts for personal projects or presentations
Map out business processes for training and documentation
Design customer journey flows for marketing and sales teams
Build org charts and project timelines for stakeholder updates
samplePrompts: Visualize a high-conversion SaaS landing page flow: from Google Ad click → hero section → feature demo → pricing table → checkout → success page with referral loop.
Architect a microservices system for an e-commerce platform: include Auth, Product Catalog, Cart, Payment Gateway (Stripe), and Order Fulfillment services with their data connections.
Generate an incident response decision tree for a security operations center: Tier 1 triage → threat detection → containment steps → stakeholder notification → post-mortem analysis.
Design a Gantt chart for a 6-month AI product roadmap: model selection (Month 1), fine-tuning (Month 2-3), beta testing (Month 4), marketing campaign (Month 5), and global launch (Month 6).
author: Albert Folch
